name: monotonic
content:
monotonic adjective
(SOUND)
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal speaking or spoken in such a way that the sound stays on the same note without going higher or lower

monotonic adjective
(QUANTITY)
mathematics
  specialized (of a quantity) only ever increasing, or only ever getting less
